alert.note: Alert for Middle Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 27 at 3:33AM AKDT until May 27 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR MIDDLE KUSKOKWIM VALLEY... * Winds...Northwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 20 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 to 25 percent. * Temperatures...Daytime highs in the low to mid 70s. * Location...Middle Kuskokwim Valley from Sleetmute east, including Stony River and Lime Village. * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
